name: Lou'Ceret Ock
ability: When this unit is destroyed replenish yours and your opponenents commodities.

name: Training Center
ability: After this system is activated you may remove this unit and spend 3 rescources to place either a drednought, cruiser or destroyer in this system.

name: Unity Herald
ability: Players who explore planets in this system gain 1 trade good. This nit rolls 1 additional die per different type of technology specialty planet you control in non home systems.

name: Technical Cracker
ability: This units planets rescource value is increased by 1.

name: Seat of Power
ability: Apply +1 to the rescource and influence value  to each planet in this units system.

name: Political Establishment
ability: Apply +2 the the influence value of the planet this unit is on.

name: Productive Complex l
ability: This units PRODUCTION value is equal to the combined rescource and influence value of planets in this system. this unit is placed in the space area instead of a planet. THis unit may retreat as ifit where a ship. If it is blockaded it is destroyed.

name: Productive Complex II
ability: This units PRODUCTION value is equal to the combined rescource and influence value of planets in this system. this unit is placed in the space area instead of a planet. This unit may move and retreat as ifit where a ship. If it is blockaded it is destroyed.
